title: Domino’s to Customers: Pick Up Your Own Pizza and We’ll Tip You
sub_head: Pizza chain is offering customers $3 tips to carryout their orders
body:
Domino’s Pizza Inc . really wants you to pick up your own pizza. They are willing to pay you to do it.
The pizza chain is letting customers who pick up their orders in stores claim a $3 tip, it said this week, a move that comes as companies nationwide are facing a shortage of labor amid a tight job market.
